text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with blueberry muffins that's right
fresh homemade sour cream and blueberry
muffins easy recipe here we go
by the way I always usually do this
stuff by hand but for some reason I got
out the electric mixer and I have the
most ridiculous electric mixer ever and
look at that thing it starts really slow
and then it goes really fast it wasn't
pretty
anyway I creamed together my butter and
sugar until sort of light and fluffy the
butter was too cold but it worked
so that was combined I threw an egg in
with some vegetable oil beat that
together added the second egg beat that
together alright once that's all
combined we're going to add our sour
cream one of the secrets to the recipe
some milk give that a whisk so I'm going
to put in a half a teaspoon of lemon
extract and in the written recipe I'm
actually going to put in some lemon zest
but I didn't have any all right and
another bowl I'm going to get my dry
ingredients ready we have flour baking
powder baking soda and salt okay you can
sift that together or you can use the
modern method which is just to run a
whisk through it just kind of aerate it
and mixes everything together once
that's ready we're going to take our wet
ingredients dump in half the dry
ingredients mix it until just combined
then dump in the other half of the dry
ingredients and the blueberries fresh
blueberries and fold that together again
until just combined you want to like
work this dough and get a bunch of
gluten build up you'll have tough
muffins but don't be too panicked about
over mixing it you just till it sort of
looks like that it's going to mix a
little more when you scoop it out into
your muffin cups all right so I've lined
my muffin tin with these paper baking
cups very convenient I'm going to fill
those up just above the top just barely
above the top I like a nice substantial
muffin so this much is going to make
about 1416 muffins that size we're gonna
bake those at 375 for 30 minutes
and there they are alright so if you see
fresh blueberries at the
market and you always wanted to try
fresh blueberry muffins here's your
recipe all the ingredients are on the
site so go check it out and as always
enjoy
